# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We provide security updates for the following versions of Supernova:

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| 1.0.x   | Yes       |
| < 1.0   | No        |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within Supernova, please report it privately.

**Do not open a public issue.**

Please report vulnerabilities via the [Project Issues](https://github.com/mrsknetwork/supernova/issues) specifically using the "Security" label if available, or contact the maintainer directly if private contact info is provided in the repository profile.

## Response Process

- **Acknowledgment:** Within 48 hours.
- **Triage:** Within 7 days.
- **Fix/Advisory:** Timeline depends on the complexity of the vulnerability.

We appreciate your help in keeping Supernova secure for everyone.
